alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Washington; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 11 at 1:48AM EDT until April 11 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR MUCH OF RHODE ISLAND... The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 10 AM this morning to 7 PM EDT this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...All of Rhode Island except for Block Island. * TIMING...Tuesday from 10 am through 7 pm. * WINDS...Southwest 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Between 15 and 25 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the mid 60s to mid 70s. * LIGHTNING...None. * IMPACTS...Very dry conditions and gusty winds will result in potentially critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now or will shortly. Any fires that start may spread rapidly and become difficult to extinguish.
